author: Kimmy Yam
title: Jeremy Lin on Asian American pride amid rising racism
description: “Just accept us as humans,” Lin said of those outside the Asian American community.
content:
Jeremy Lin has a heavy heart these days.
With Asian Americas weathering heightened anti-Asian sentiment amid the pandemic, and the number of hate attacks rising sharply, Lin, the former NBA star now with the Beijing Ducks of the Chinese Basketball Associatio… [+6332 chars]
